title: 附魔指令
author: .OwO.
txt_content:
本帖最后由 .OwO. 于 2020-4-20 10:24 编辑 

弓的
力量32767
火矢
无限
耐久32767
冲击5
版本:1.15.2
小小金粒不成谢意~
测试后才能给最佳哦~

replies.author: xzc113004
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator/#/item/
指令做武器生成，你可以试试

replies.author: 暗黑荆轲
replies.txt_content:
/enchant @p [附魔属性] [等级]
这个突破上线需要到命令方块里

replies.author: 叶烨子
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:bow 1 32767 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:32767,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.knockbackResistance",Name:"CBC"}],Unbreakable:1,HideFlags:1}
这个是是，刚刚累得可能会被吞掉……

replies.author: Kunst
replies.txt_content: https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator/#/item/ 可以看下这样以后就不用来搜了
